channel.title: Apps on Systems Management Squad
channel.description: Recent content in Apps on Systems Management Squad

item.title: Find Microsoft Accounts on Company Domains
item.description: The other day I was helping someone over in the WinAdmins Discord. Their users kept getting confused about what their passwords were, and it was causing a lot of HelpDesk tickets. Let’s find out what users have Microsoft accounts on the company domain so we can help move those accounts elsewhere to streamline the user experience. Update on Prevention: Microsoft has introduced some changes that at least seem to prevent NEW Microsoft Accounts on Company Domains.

item.title: Signing and Deploying Applications via MSIX with Intune
item.description: Why would I want to use MSIX and what is it? MSIX is a Windows app package format that provides a modern packaging experience to all Windows apps. The MSIX package format preserves the functionality of existing app packages and/or install files in addition to enabling new, modern packaging and deployment features to Win32, WPF, and Windows Forms apps. Do you have a bloated application? Maybe one or two that are so old it doesn’t even have any install parameters?
